Name: Deck Defenders
About the game: Welcome to Deck Defenders, the digital card game that lets you battle with other players, collect cards, build decks and compete for rank. In this game, you'll be able to take control of your own deck and battle against opponents in exciting duels. You'll be able to collect cards from a variety of different sets, build your own custom decks, and compete in ranked matches against other players. With a wide variety of cards, strategies and playstyles to choose from, you can create your own unique deck and playstyle to take on the competition. So, get ready to take on the challenge and become a Deck Defender! Deck Building Build your unique deck with 100 cards to discover from the Frontlines set, and from more sets coming soon! Create the right combination of units to play, equipment to buff them, and spells to destroy the competition. Unlock new cards as you play, and craft the gameplay style that is perfect for you! Climb the Ladder! Choose your own tactics and take down other players on the PVP ladder. Synergies and strategies are easy to learn, with depth that will lead the best players to the top. Take on the challenge, adapt to new opponents, and try to reach the peak unrivaled. Beta Deck Defenders is a Strategic Card Battler rendered in a colorful and eye-catching pixel art style that is on display with every card. You can jump right into the action and rank up on the PVP ladder, or you can rise to the task of defeating the AI in the challenging campaign mode. Decorate your arena with cosmetic platforms and accessories. Coming soon to Steam early access!
